name: Switch Ball Jumper
description:
Jump and bounce through over 60 platform checkpoints to reach the safety of the exit, will you make it?

Bounce through stunning colour changes as you drop through the levels, remember you always stay whem hit checkpoint. Avoid collapsing walls and ceilings, Color Switch Jumper platforms With a simple one tap system, you’ll need fast reactions, cunning timing and nerves of steel to reach the safety of the Color Switch Jumper checkpoints and save your game progress.

Don’t be deceived, Color Switch Jumper is a relatively chilled out puzzle escape platforming experience, but let your guard down and it becomes brutally hard to find the way out!
